alert.note: Alert for Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Searcy and central Van Buren Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watts, or near Marshall, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Shirley... Kay... Fairfield Bay Marina... Rocky Hill... Elba... Woolum... Imo... Choctaw... Elberta... Watts... Old Lexington... Leslie... Beverage Town... Alread... Canaan... Rupert... Scotland... Dennard... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
